now cold in July is a violent thriller
set in Texas in the late 80s in his
review Stephen Holden writes the feisty
camaraderie among the main characters
gives cold in July a euphoric goofiness
it often feels they might as well be
colliding bumper cars at the wildest

conceived by their less bright

movie is just not funny on so many
